name: 3D Duck Hunt HD - free duck hunting games, duck hunter simulator
name_original: 3D Duck Hunt HD - free duck hunting games, duck hunter simulator
description:
Duck Hunt HD Lite is the free duck hunting games, duck hunter simulator with great 3d graphics.
It is a fun duck hunting games, you can try to shooting the flying ducks.

Feature:
- Tilt & Touch controls.
- Amazing graphics and sound effects.
- 3 different style scene.
- unlock new weapons and scene by hunting the ducks.
